DOC.brief_summary: Prevenar 13 is safe for administration to Filipinos.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Surveillance of Pneumococcal 13-valent Conjugate Vaccine Among Filipinos
DOC.detailed_description: Filipino patients prescribed and administered with the vaccine will be monitored for safety Patients prescribed with the vaccine who provides consent for inclusion to the study will be observed.
DOC.criteria: Patients prescribed with the vaccine Patients with hypersensitivity to the vaccine
